column2: Death of Wolverine: The Logan Legacy (2014) #7
column6: - It's all come to this! The heroes and villains closest to Wolverine-Mystique, Daken, Sabretooth, X-23 and Lady Deathstrike-make a monumental decision that will forever alter the Legacy that Logan built years forging. That is, if they survive the threat of the vampiric menace challenging their goals!
